actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Asian Development Fund.

summary.text: Amends the Asian Development Bank Act to authorize the United States Governor of the Bank to make the second and third installments of the United States contribution to the First Replenishment of the Resources of the Asian Development Fund. Authorizes the appropriation of sums necessary to make such contribution.

titles.title: A bill to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Asian Development Fund.
